ModuleTitle: Theory and algorithms for nonlinear optimization
Prerequisite: MA3252 Linear and Network Optimisation or BDC6111/IE6001 Foundations on Optimization or departmental approval
ModuleDescription: This module provides a comprehensive introduction to the basic theory and algorithms for nonlinear optimization problems with polyhedral and non-polyhedral constraints. Major topics to be covered include: smooth optimization, constraint qualifications, second order necessary and sufficient conditions, composite nonsmooth optimization, first and second order methods for large scale problems.
